editorialNotes.tagline: New ways to sketch and animate
editorialNotes.standard: With stunning filters and thousands of importable brushes, this app lets you generate high-calibre artwork at a blistering pace. It supports pressure sensitivity and Apple Pencil–as well as iCloud Drive–so sharing your work is incredibly simple.
editorialNotes.short: This super-intuitive app makes it simple to paint your next masterpiece.
Learn to read and pronounce words with your new friend!
editorialNotes.tagline: Learn to read with a friend

editorialNotes.standard: Nothing beats a kid-friendly game that keeps the whole family captivated—and Toca has us snipping, straightening, and styling to our heart's content. Once we've perfected our customer's silly new ‘dos, we make sure to add some accessories, snap a pic, and share the hair.

editorialNotes.short: See internal organs in action: lungs breathe, muscles bend and nerves respond to a pinprick.

editorialNotes.standard: Wherever you are on your filmmaking journey, this multitrack video editor meets you there. Its features are rarely found in an iPad app, and everything’s accessible through an intuitive touch interface.
editorialNotes.short: Apply transitions, effects and more with these powerful editing tools.

editorialNotes.tagline: See the body in 3D and AR

editorialNotes.standard: With a suite of powerful tools, touch-screen controls, gorgeous templates, and customizable effects, this full-featured editor is in a class of its own. Plus, with iCloud Drive, you can edit on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, wherever you are.
editorialNotes.short: Make your pictures shine with this set of photography tools.
Help yourself resist distractions from your device.
Please the crowd on game day with great healthy appetizer ideas.

editorialNotes.tagline: The tools for your first draft

editorialNotes.standard: Made with Tinybop’s usual charm and polish, Simple Machines distills difficult ideas into fun hands-on lessons. Spin giant screws, crack open icy boulders and use levers to bombard cartoon castles—all while learning about real-world physics.
editorialNotes.short: Interact with machines to understand physics.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: It’s not every day that an app helps you become a better person. But that’s what Streaks does with a simple, compelling design that gets out of the way—and lets you focus on healthy eating, reading, flossing, and winning at life. Oh yeah, and it’s one of the best Apple Watch apps we’ve ever used.
editorialNotes.short: Commit to your habits with advanced reminders.

ios.subtitle: Read PDF in dark + larger text
Best Stalker IPTV App with EPG

editorialNotes.short: Try a wild new look – risk-free!
editorialNotes.tagline: Go all out for crazy hair day!
